name: 莊欣慈
objective:
本課程旨在介紹如何加強英文基礎文法修辭，以及學習短段落寫作的常見文體；讓學生熟稔運用基本文法，以正確且清晰地表達其構思。

This course is intended to provide an overview of basic English grammar. The grammatical concepts taught in this course are used as a background for students to construct sentences and short paragraphs that convey ideas effectively and clearly.
schedule:
Week(s)　　Read to Succeed 4
1　　Orientation
2-3　　Unit 6 – Determiners 
4　　Pre-test
5-6　　Unit 7 – Simple Present & Present Progressive Tense
7      Review
8　　Midterm Examination
9-10　　  Unit 8 – Simple Past & Past Progressive Tense
11-12 Unit 9 – Future & Future Progressive Tense
13-14 Unit 10 – Perfect Tense
15-16 Review
17　　Post-test
18　　Final Examination
scorePolicy:

筆記寫作  30%
期中文法與寫作測驗  15%
期末文法與寫作測驗  15%
